definitions.title: n. pr. loc.
definitions.body: in Ramah (poss. = habitations, but dub., v. Dr:1Sa 19:18 HPS);—adode of prophets 1Sa 19:18, 1Sa 19:19, 1Sa 19:22, 1Sa 19:23, 1Sa 19:23 and 1Sa 20:1 (where Baer [[נוות]] Kt); sq. [[בָּרָמָה]] (exc. 1Sa 19:18); LXX )Auaq (n dropped out after e)n), so LXXL A Nauiwq.
